While it dosent have the same replayablity or polish as portal 2 this game is still worth its price. Even the short ammount of mods for this game is great, worth picking up on sale if you are really unsure.
even in 2021 its an amazing game! but F for Valve :/
Not hard, doesn't destroy your brain cells.
Fun but very short. I would recommend getting this on sale along with the second game if you're interested in playing the two of them.

Way too short !! It took me only 4 hours and a half to finish it. But it has such a good vibe ! It's funny, creepy, the lore seems interresting, the gameplay is interresting and fun. The song at the end is so cool haha
holy shit this game is amazing 11/10 very short tho
very good some puzzles are really difficult but that's the point.
this is my favorite game now
Fun puzzle solving 3D platformer, One of Valve's best game series in my opinion, Great diffiuclty curve (Except for that one level but that could just be me lol) Definitely worth a try
game fun. game short. made a new save tonight and finished it in around and hour
10/10 i can feel my brain hurt
Portal is love, portal is life
Hey guys. The cake is lie!!!! Lolololol XD
It's still damn good and you can get it cheep. Really no reason not to pick up this classic masterpiece on a sale if you haven't gotten a chance to play it before.

Its good. I originally got this game on Xbox 360 with the Orange Box (Which I'm SHOCKED they haven't rereleased for current gen consoles). It was great and very difficult the first time I played it. Fun and the 2nd game is even better!

buenas mecanicas, muy entretenido, no es una historia muy larga ni muy corta y la cancion del final lo vale

one of the best games ever. play it before you die!!!
a must play for anyone getting into pc gaming
This is a must. Honest to god I started out feeling dumb as a rock and this game helped me learn to read my sorroundings better.

The puzzles in this game really do hold up after years and years and the story is tight for a puzzle game. Pretty short, though, like this review.
Very clever puzzle game with an interesting story-line guiding it along, but beware - it is quite creepy. But also filled with humor - a twisted, dark kind of humor.
This is one of the games that you need to play before you can consider yourself a gamer, PLAY IT!

A stunning and utterly revolutionary game you could probably beat in one afternoon! Everything in this game is great, from the atmosphere to the writing and dark usage of comedy to the foreboding and ominous music and implications in its excellent environmental storytelling (that's both very subtle and in-your-face at the same time) to the character(s?) to the game mechanics that changed the gaming industry forever to iconic memes and jokes, the entire game is packaged and crafted beautifully. Like a cake, it has many layers. Please play this if you haven't already. It's an absolute must.
